title: The journal of Sir Walter Scott,
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: We stopped at Allanton to see a tree transplanted, which was performed with great ease.

title: Memoirs of the life of Sir Walter Scott,
author: Lockhart, J. G.
snippet: In September, the Highland Society of Scotland, at the request of the late Sir Henry Stewart of Allanton, sent a deputation to his seat in Lanarkshire, to examine and report upon his famous improvements in the art of transplanting  trees.

title: Memoirs of the life of Sir Walter Scott,
author: Lockhart, J. G.
snippet: Next day, on our way to Edinburgh, we stopped at Allanton to see a tree transplanted, which was performed with great ease.
